question.question_text: A car is traveling along a straight rode at a constant speed of 100mph for 5 hours calculate the total distance traveled

files.question.html: A car is traveling along a straight road at a constant speed of {{params.v}} {{params.unitsSpeed}} for {{params.t}} {{params.unitsTime}}. Calculate the total distance traveled.
files.server.js:
import math

def generate(use_predefined_values=0):
    # Define units
    units_speed = 'mph'
    units_distance = 'miles'
    
    if use_predefined_values == 0:
        # Generate random values for speed and time
        speed = 100  # Constant speed in mph
        time = 5     # Time in hours
    else:
        # Predefined values dataset
        predefined_data = [
            {'v': 100, 't': 5},
            {'v': 60, 't': 2},
            {'v': 75, 't': 3},
            {'v': 120, 't': 4},
            {'v': 90, 't': 1}
        ]
        chosen_values = predefined_data[0]  # Use first entry for simplicity
        speed = chosen_values['v']
        time = chosen_values['t']
    
    # Calculate distance
    # Distance = Speed × Time
    distance = speed * time  # Distance in miles
    
    # Prepare return values
    return {
        'params': {
            'v': round(speed, 3),
            't': round(time, 3),
            'unitsSpeed': units_speed,
            'unitsDistance': units_distance,
            'd': round(distance, 3)  
        },
        'correct_answers': {
            'd': round(distance, 3)
        },
        'nDigits': 3,
        'sigfigs': 3,
    }
files.solution.html:
<pl-solution-panel>
    <pl-hint level="1" data-type="text">
        The car is traveling at a constant speed of {{params.v}} {{params.unitsSpeed}} for a duration of {{params.t}} {{params.unitsTime}}.
    </pl-hint>
    <pl-hint level="2" data-type="text">
        The formula to calculate the distance traveled at a constant speed is given by:
        $$ d = vt $$
    </pl-hint>
    <pl-hint level="3" data-type="text">
        Substituting the known values, we have:
        $$ d = {{params.v}} 	imes {{params.t}} $$
    </pl-hint>
    <pl-hint level="4" data-type="text">
        Now, substituting the given values to find the total distance traveled:
        $$ d = ({{params.v}}) \times ({{params.t}}) = {{correct_answers.d}} {{params.unitsDistance}} $$
    </pl-hint>
</pl-solution-panel>
